title: Video: Eurobike day two Top Trumps
content:
Day two of Eurobike 2021, and, following their day one video, David and Ronan are back with another game of Eurobike Top Trumps with their favourite new tech. 

Today the two most difficult accents in cycling media discuss why Cippollini might have a new e-bike, a bike updated on some feedback from our very own James Huang, Tom Pidcock’s Olympics winning bike, a bike for the apocalypse, and much more. 

Finally, David explains to newbie Ronan what he is missing at this year’s Eurobike.
author: Ronan Mc Laughlin
